title: Administrator's Manual
text_1: The user can log in using their own registration.
text_2: The user can change their password by clicking on their name in the menu and going to the Account Settings section.
text_3_i: In the menu, clicking on 'Add Question' creates a voting question.
text_4_i: The user can define multiple voting questions.
text_5_i: The user can activate and deactivate questions.
text_6_i: Each question is generated with a QR code and a unique 5-character code.
text_8_i: Questions with a correct answer choice.
text_9_i: Questions with an open short answer.
text_11_i: Results can be displayed as a list or a word cloud.
text_13_i: The user can edit, delete, and copy existing questions.
text_15_i: Each question can be assigned to a subject.
text_17_i: Questions can be filtered by subject and creation date.
text_19_i: The user can close the current vote on a question, which includes backing up responses and adding a note and the closing date. Do so by clicking the backup icon.
text_21_i: The option to display results of current and archived votes. (icon eye)
text_23_i: For questions with correct answer choices, current voting can be compared with historical votes using a table.
text_25_i: The option to export questions and answers to an external file (JSON). Click the 'Export Questions and Answers' button.
text_27_i: The administrator has the same functionality as a logged-in user with the difference that they have access to the voting questions of all logged-in users with the ability to filter by selected user.
text_28_i: When creating a new voting question, the administrator can specify whether they are doing it on their own behalf or on behalf of another user.
text_29_i: The administrator has access to managing logged-in users, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting (CRUD) user accounts, as well as the ability to change their roles and passwords.
text_31_i: The user can access the voting question page by:
text_33_i: Entering the entry code on the application's homepage.
text_34_i: Entering the address in the browser in the form 'https://node65.webte.fei.stuba.sk/abcde', where 'abcde' is the 5-character entry code.
text_36_i: After filling in the voting question, the user will be redirected to a page with a graphical display of the voting results for that question.
text_37_i: You can return to the application's home page from this page.
